title: Presidency of George W. Bush
deleted: Although the main aim of his plan was to overthrow the Taliban, many innocent people were killed due to the invasion of the American troops. According to some sorces 71,000 innocent cillillians were killed in 2001 due to the invasion<ref>{{Cite web|title=Afghan Civilians {{!}} Costs of War|url=https://watson.brown.edu/costsofwar/costs/human/civilians/afghan|access-date=2021-09-28|website=The Costs of War|language=en}}</ref>. However, President Bush has denied this and said that only the Taliban were killed in the fighting and if any of the cilvillans were to have died, this was all by a few mistakes that have been done. <ref>{{Cite web|title=Afghan Civilians {{!}} Costs of War|url=https://watson.brown.edu/costsofwar/costs/human/civilians/afghan|access-date=2021-09-28|website=The Costs of War|language=en}}</ref>

Just as mentioned above that the main aim was to overthrow [[Saddam Hussein|Saddam Hussain]] out of office, an estimated of a million Iraqi civilians were killed in the war according to ORB international in 2013<ref>{{Cite web|title=Opinion {{!}} The Iraq Death Toll 15 Years After the US Invasion|url=https://www.commondreams.org/views/2018/03/15/iraq-death-toll-15-years-after-us-invasion|access-date=2021-09-28|website=Common Dreams|language=en}}</ref>.
